text: Ani jevha majhe upasaka majhyavisayi tumhala vicaratila, tevha tyanna sanga ki mi agadi javala ahe. Pratyeka prarthana karanaryacya prarthanela, jevha jevha to mala pukarato, mi kabula karato. Yastava lokannihi majha hukuma manala pahije ani majhyavara imana rakhale pahije. Heca tyancya bhala'ice karana ahe
